Wolfblade::

She looked at him and nodded yes. "Yeah. I need some air. Let's go."  
She walked over to him. "And don't worry about me. I'm just fine. But 
thanks for asking."  Her voice was hard. But her optics showed more 
than that. She walked past him. "Uh, wher is this ship we're supposed 
to dismantal."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "bustercross365" <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice looked at the sickened Wolfblade.
> "Maybe you should rest a while, you don't look so hot.  I will 
leave 
> to go get that generator here in a few cycles.  Do you want to come 
> with me?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > Wolfblade::
> > 
> > She turned her head back towards the area the kid was at and 
> > muttered, "I think I'm going to be sick." She shook her head and 
> > looked at Malice. "Uh, yeah. Great idea. Look, I need an enerGin. 
> > I'll be right back."  She went into the mess hall and got herself 
a 
> > drink. She slammed it down and sighed. "OK, one small rocket with 
a 
> > high power fuel and two thrusters, it could work."
> > 
> >
